title: Connections
description: Connections is the catalog of one-click integrations and Private Data-Source Connect (PDC).

title: Data Sources
description: 'Data sources' lists every configured backend—Prometheus, CloudWatch, BigQuery, and more—plus connection status, quotas, and edit links.

title: Integrations
description: The Integrations catalog bundles exporters, dashboards, and alerts for popular services (Linux node, NGINX, Redis, etc.) behind point-and-click cards.

title: Dashboards
description: The Dashboards area is where you view, create, and organize Grafana's famous boards—mixing graphs, logs, traces, and text in one canvas.

title: Drilldown
description: Metrics and Logs Drilldown pages take a selected series and open a context-rich view—showing labels, histograms, or correlated traces—so you can peel back layers without leaving Grafana.

title: Metrics Drilldown
description: Query-less Prometheus explorer.

title: Logs Drilldown
description: Logs Drilldown opens a Loki workspace pre-grouped by labels.

title: Explore
description: Explore is a query workbench for interactive, ad-hoc digging into metrics, logs, or traces without building a full dashboard first.

title: Explore Traces
description: Distributed-trace analysis.

title: Explore Profiles
description: Powered by Pyroscope.

title: Alerts & IRM
description: The Alerts & Incident Response Management (IRM) hub unifies alert rules, OnCall schedules, and incident timelines in a single app.

title: Observability
description: The Observability menu gathers turnkey solutions—Application, Frontend, Kubernetes, Infrastructure monitoring—all powered by the LGTM+ stack (Mimir, Loki, Tempo, Pyroscope).

title: Bookmarks
description: Bookmarks let you pin any page—dashboards, Explore, admin views—to a 'Bookmarks' section that sits at the top of the left-hand nav.

title: Home
description: The Cloud Home app is the landing screen for every stack.

title: Getting Started Guide
description: This guided workflow installs demo data sources and sample dashboards.

title: SLO home
description: Grafana SLO lets you define SLIs, SLOs, and burn-rate alerts.

title: Performance Testing
description: Run load tests from the cloud.

title: Synthetic Monitoring
description: Black-box uptime testing.

title: Asserts
description: Auto-analyzes Prometheus metrics to surface anomalies.

title: Application
description: OpenTelemetry-based APM suite.

title: Cloud Provider
description: Connects to AWS/Azure/GCP.

title: Kubernetes
description: Turnkey Helm or Alloy installer for cluster telemetry.

title: Frontend
description: Real-user monitoring with Faro.

title: Collector
description: Fleet management for ingest agents.

title: More Apps
description: Bucket for installed app plugins.

title: Administration
description: Org-level housekeeping.

title: Advisor
description: Instance hygiene scanning.

title: Cost Management
description: Aggregates usage cost across telemetry types.
